title: Digital Storytelling workshop : general public (March 2007)
creator_credit: Sue Silk, Sonya Waters, Sally McCutcheon, Martin Zerfas, Lyn McLeavy, Louise Blake, Llywellyn Staiff, Joyce Evans, Edwin Whiting, Christine Lamb, Alfred Zerfas, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Eleven stories from members of the general public. Mostly autobiographical, they are stories that concern themselves mostly with the passions of the creator, whether social issues, history, hobbies or family. These passions and interests are what makes the participants who they are.
creator_credit_for_label: Sue Silk, Sonya Waters, Sally McCutcheon, Martin Zerfas, Lyn McLeavy, Louise Blake, Llywellyn Staiff, Joyce Evans, Edwin Whiting, Christine Lamb, Alfred Zerfas, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
